short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help viewers to understand when you are showing a game or a variation in chess.com during your streams!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension changes the colors of the board when analysing variants out of mainline in chess.com 
New in V2! Hue Rotation Angle setup now available in options! So you can customize colors! Thanks for Felipe Prado @PradoChess for contributing with this idea!
